checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'communication' and NAME = 'listeninterface' and VALUE != '.global'
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'communication' and NAME = 'listeninterface' and NOT ( VALUE != '.global' )

checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'auditing configuration' and NAME = 'default_audit_trail_type' and VALUE = 'SYSLOGPROTOCOL'
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'auditing configuration' and NAME = 'default_audit_trail_type' and NOT ( VALUE = 'SYSLOGPROTOCOL' )

checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'auditing configuration' and NAME = 'global_auditing_state' and VALUE = 'true'
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'auditing configuration' and NAME = 'global_auditing_state' and NOT ( VALUE = 'true' )

checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'persistence' and NAME = 'basepath_logbackup' and VALUE like '/hana/backup/log/%'
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'persistence' and NAME = 'basepath_logbackup' and VALUE not like '/hana/backup/log/%'

checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'persistence' and NAME = 'basepath_databackup' and ( VALUE like '/hana/backup/%/data' OR VALUE like '/hana_backup/%/data' )
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'persistence' and NAME = 'basepath_databackup' and NOT ( VALUE like '/hana/backup/%/data' OR VALUE like '/hana_backup/%/data' )

checkitem.compliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'backup' and NAME = 'data_backup_max_chunk_size' and VALUE = '512000'
checkitem.noncompliant: FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' and SECT = 'backup' and NAME = 'data_backup_max_chunk_size' and NOT VALUE = '512000'
